"Closed β Test":
"Welcome to the \"Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis\" Closed β Test!

This is \"Central City\", one of the cities on the Planet Halpha, the new frontier of battle.
This is an important base located in the center of the world, where you'll begin your adventure as \"ARKS\"."

"In this Closed β Test, we have omitted the main story elements so that you may have a spoiler free experience while you learn how to play [PSO2: NGS].

As a rookie ARKS, follow the advice and counsel of the Instructor, Guiden. Work hard in your training and set your goal in defeating the boss enemy \"Nagrus\"!

TL Note: Poggers!"
"Items <yellow>inherited from your [PSO2] Inventory<c> can be accessed from the <yellow>Storage Terminal<c> in Central City, under the <yellow>[PSO2] Inventory<c> section."
